sentences.sContent: Image color was inverted to give the Au tips on top of the SiNWs and colorized orange to look like volcanoes.
sentences.sContent_eng: Image color was inverted to give the Au tips on top of the SiNWs and colorized orange to look like volcanoes.
sentences.sCn: 氮化硅纳米线顶端金膜的反向彩色图像，是着色成桔黄色看起来像是火山。

sentences.sContent: Thus the inverted pendulum is very useful in determining whether a particular scheduling choice is better than another one, in which cases, to which extent, and so on.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thus the inverted pendulum is very useful in determining whether a particular scheduling choice is better than another one, in which cases, to which extent, and so on.
sentences.sCn: 如此倒立摆是非常有用的在决定是否一个特殊的时序安排的选择比另一个好，在哪个情形下，在什么程度内等等。

words.tran: 颠倒的事物；倒置物；倒悬者
换流器，[电子] 反相器；倒转者
使…转化；使…颠倒；使…反转；使…前后倒置
